body:
Um... So.... Where did Dylan go? He hasn't been on for 4 days. Neither of his alts have sr mod.

Is he retired, demoted or temp retired???

I just wanna know
body_tagged:

title: Where did Dylan go?

replies.body: He retired from his senior moderator position. Next time just ask around if you have small questions like these, we don't really need a forum thread for it.
replies.body_tagged: He retired from his senior moderator position. Next time just ask around if you have small questions like these, we don't really need a forum thread for it.

replies.body:
As Mango said, a thread on the forums isn't the best way to ask a simply question.
Just hit me up on Skype next time mate :)
